title: Remote Outbound Setter
job_overview:
Company & Role Overview
Cleaning Business University
Position: Outbound Setter (Independent Contractor)
Location: Remote (US hours, CST)
Hours: Mon–Fri, 9?AM–5?PM CST
Base Pay: $5/hr (40 hrs/week, paid weekly)
Bonus: Performance-based, enrollment-driven (details in final interview)

???? Mission-Driven Role
Cleaning Business University has helped thousands launch their own businesses—generating over $18M in student revenue. We’re growing fast and need a hungry, confident, and data-driven Outbound Setter to fuel our pipeline. You’ll speak to warm leads and book qualified calls that convert.

???? What You’ll Do
Make 100+ dials/day via Aloware or GHL to fresh and re-engaged leads
Reach 30–40 new leads daily and send targeted follow-up texts
Book 5+ qualified appointments/day using Calendly
Re-ignite cold or abandoned applications
Keep CRM (/GHL/CBU Portal) clean and updated
Share EOD reports covering metrics, lessons, blockers
Master our payment systems (Whop, Stripe, Klarna, Fanbasis, Easy Pay) and align leads to best fit

???? What You Bring
Confident conversationalist who builds trust and energy
Obsession with numbers and consistency
Tech-savvy: experience with Aloware/GHL, Calendly, Slack, Excel/Sheets
Coachable, independent, never settling for 'good enough'
Organized, reliable, and KPI-obsessed

???? Measures of Success
90–120 qualified calls/month
600–800 outbound touches/month
Advisor calendars booked 1–2 days ahead
40%+ show-up rate on all appointments
CRM cleanliness: no duplicates or stale data

???? Who This Isn’t For
People needing heavy direction or micromanagement
Those who ghost leads, avoid KPIs, or blame others
Setters unwilling to embrace coaching and feedback
Side-gig seekers lacking consistency

? Who We Want
Experienced in outbound for coaching, agencies, info products
Skilled at transitioning interest to appointment
Familiar with urgency, follow-up tactics, and decision drivers
Coachable, consistent, and hungry for results

?? How to Apply
Please send your application with a subject line "CBU Setter – [Your Name]". Include your resume, a one-minute Loom recording talking about yourself, and a portfolio. Failure to do so will automatically result in decline. Include why you’re perfect for this role. Show us your stats, past results, or best sales call audio if available.
Closing

Cleaning Business University is scaling—our leads are primed. We just need an exceptional Outbound Setter to close the gap.
Is that you?
